author: Yong Pung How CJ (delivering the judgment of the court):
coram: Andrew Ang J; Chao Hick Tin JA; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Tony Yeo, Joanna Koh and Rozalynne Asmali (Drew and Napier LLC) for the appellant; Ponnampalam Sivakumar (Joseph Lopez and Co) for the respondents; Lau Kok Keng for the Law Society of Singapore; Jeffrey Chan and Dominic Zou for the Attorney-General
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Admission/Ad hoc/Queen's Counsel applying for admission to Singapore Bar on ad hoc basis to appear in matter to be heard before Court of Appeal/Whether issues of sufficient difficulty and complexity existing/Whether to allow application/Section 21(1) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed)
